sentences.sContent: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.sCn: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.sContent: The movie has won a number of awards.
...Colleges taking another look at value of merit-based aid Good grades and high tests scores still matter—a lot—to many colleges as they award financial aid...

exam.question: Three university departments have been ________ ＄600,000 to develop good practice in teaching and learning.

answer.explain: 给予， 授予， 常与to连用。句意： 大学授予三个系60万美元的奖金， 以促进其教学发展。promote： 提升， 促进， 发扬； include： 包括， 包含； secure： 向…提供保证。

phrases.pCn: 奥斯卡金像奖；学院奖（美国电影艺术科学院颁发的年度奖项）
格莱美奖（美国音乐奖项）

remMethod.val: a(一) ＋ ward(看作word， 话) → 这句话是给你的最好的奖品 → 奖品

trans.tranOther: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done
